mapper.insert: insert into members (userId, userName, userPassword, userEmail, userPhone) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select: select userId, userName, userEmail, userPhone, userRole, delflag from members order by userRole
select userId, userName, userEmail, userRole from members where userId = #{userId} and userPassword = #{userPassword} and delflag=0
mapper.update: update members set userPassword = #{userPassword} where userId = #{userId}
mapper.delete: update members set delflag = 1 where userId = #{userId}
